featured.text: Therefore, proms have been held every year in high schools for students to learn proper social behavior.

other.text: Rap's rise and sustained global popularity is a good illustration of how influential youth culture is on youth attitudes and behavior.

An open display of ______ behavior between men and women, such as hugging and kissing, is not allowed in some conservative societies.

Which of the following statements about horror movies can be inferred from the passage? (A) Most horror movie lovers are prone to aggressive behavior.

definition.en_def: The way in which one acts or conducts oneself.
definition.example: His behavior in class was disruptive.
